wikipedia_page.main: Frank Watson (15 November 1898 – 27 September 1972) was an English professional football forward who played in the Football League for Blackpool and Brentford.

response: * Frank Watson (American politician) (born 1945), Republican Minority Leader of the Illinois State Senate
* Frank Watson (rugby league) (1923–2016), rugby league footballer of the 1940s and 1950s for Leeds, and Castleford
* Frank Watson (Bahamas politician) (born 1940), former Deputy Prime Minister of the Bahamas
